column1: GE PERFORMANCE SERIES MODEL NUMBERS & SPECS

column2: Designed to slide directly into existing 26" wall sleeves, ensuring a professional, gap-free installation for Hawaii townhomes and apartments.
Engineered with high-torque fans to maximize air throw, effectively eliminating hot spots in deep-room configurations.
Features a precision digital interface with a remote control for easy temperature management across different island micro-climates.
Simplifies maintenance by allowing users to quickly clean the filter, maintaining peak airflow and preventing salt-air buildup.
Automatically restarts at the previous settings when power is restored after island utility surges or outages.
